topic.title: How to Add Asian Fonts in Linux

indexterm.product: author developer editor authorEclipse developerEclipse editorEclipse

body.p: On Linux distributions, for Asian languages you need to set a custom font inside a CSS customization. For example we will use here the Noto CJK font.
body.note: As a prerequisite we downloaded the font NotoSansCJKsc-hinted.zip from Noto CJK and unzipped it in a resources folder.
body.p: Finally, you create a custom Publishing Template and refer the CSS file or use the args.css parameter in a new transformation scenario.
